meanings.definition: A type of evergreen shrub native to western North America.
meanings.sent1: The salal bush grows in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I saw some salal plants while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel made a cozy nest under the salal shrub.
meanings.sent4: The salal bushes stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the salal shrub caught my eye.

meanings.definition: The edible dark purple berries of the salal shrub.
meanings.sent1: I picked some ripe salal berries for a snack.
meanings.sent2: The jam was made from fresh salal berries.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily while feasting on the juicy salal berries.
meanings.sent4: The bowl of salal berries looked like a treasure trove of sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the ripe salal berries filled the air with delight.

meanings.definition: A plant used in traditional Native American medicine for its healing properties.
meanings.sent1: The healer prepared a potion using salal leaves.
meanings.sent2: Salal has been used for centuries in Native American remedies.
meanings.sent3: The wise elder shared the secret of the healing salal plant.
meanings.sent4: The power of the salal plant brought relief to the sick.
meanings.sent5: The salal plant was believed to possess magical healing abilities.
